text1:
And it's new, the shape of your body
It's blue, the feeling I've got
And it's ooh, whoa-oh

Wish We could turn back time
To the good old days
When Our Mama sang us to sleep

I said, ooh, I'm blinded by the lights, 
No, I can't sleep until I feel your touch
text2: No, I can't sleep until I feel your touch

text1: Now you're just somebody that I used to know
text2: Somebody that I used to know

text1:
So you're a tough guy, 
Like it really rough guy, 
Just can't get enough guy

I'm waking up, I feel it in my bones, 
Enough to make my system blow
text2: Welcome to the new age, to the new age

text1:
We could have had it all, 
Rolling in the deep
text2: You had my heart inside of your hand

text1:
I'm in love with the shape of you, 
We push and pull like a magnet do
text2: I'm in love with your body

text1:
Is this the real life? 
Is this just fantasy?
text2: Caught in a landslide, no escape from reality

text1:
Take me to church, I'll worship like a dog 
At the shrine of your lies
text2: I'll tell you my sins and you can sharpen your knife

text1:
Coming out of my cage, 
And I've been doing just fine
text2: Gotta gotta be down because I want it all

text1:
Can't stop, addicted to the shindig, 
Chop top, he says I'm gonna win big
text2: This life is more than just a read-through

text1:
With the lights out, it's less dangerous, 
Here we are now, entertain us

I'm gonna fight 'em off, 
A seven nation army couldn't hold me back
text2: And I'm talking to myself at night

text1:
Lately, I've been, I've been losing sleep, 
Dreaming about the things that we could be
text2: But baby, I've been, I've been dreaming cars
